div.h1: File:Flag of Colorado designed by Andrew Carlisle Carson.svg

img.alt: File:Flag of Colorado designed by Andrew Carlisle Carson.svg

div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 512 × 341 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 213 pixels | 640 × 426 pixels | 800 × 533 pixels | 1,024 × 682 pixels | 1,280 × 853 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 512 × 341 pixels, file size: 790 bytes)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.
DescriptionFlag of Colorado designed by Andrew Carlisle Carson.svg

td.div: English: This version replaces the previous version. The title of the file has been changed to reflect the correct name of the designer of the flag. The colors have been updated to the specified hexadecimal numbers used in the flag of the National Flag (Old Glory Red: BF0A30 & Old Glory Blue: 002868) as instructed here: https://www.50states.com/flag/coflag.htm The shapes have also been geometrically exacted.

div.style: clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#eee; border:2px solid #ddd; padding:8px; direction: ltr;

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

td.div: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
